name: Bouncy Run
description:
there are currently 10 levels in this game, all the assets were made by me except the coins which are from the unity asset store. this is a submission to the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

warning some of the UI and stuff don't seem to properly display on the screen so yeah :(

i got some coding help from Shrakyts on reddit.

warning game might be kinda hard

how I interpreted the theme: greed: the more coins you have the slower you get
